params.description: list of layers which can be requested through the control. Each array element is an object, with following properties :
params.name: gfiOptions.layers

params.description: {@link http://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.layer.Layer.html ol.layer.Layer} layer handled by the control (that has been added to map).
params.name: gfiOptions.layers.obj

params.description: name of the mouse event triggering getFeatureInfo on this layer (that has been added to map). allowed values are : 'singleclick', 'dblclick' and 'contextmenu'. If not specified the triggering event is the current default event (see gfiOptions.options.defaultEvent).
params.name: gfiOptions.layers.event

params.description: indicates the format mime-type of the response of GetFeatureInfo requests.
params.name: gfiOptions.layers.infoFormat

params.description: custom options object to configure the control, with following properties :
params.name: gfiOptions.options

params.description: specifies if the widget should be hidden.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.hidden

params.description: specifies if the control run in automatic mode. In automatic mode all vector layers added on run time or added at map initialization can be requested through the control. The triggering event of those layers is the default event.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.auto

params.description: specifies if the control is active or inactive. In inactive mode requests are not fired and no information are displayed.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.active

params.description: default triggering event chosen in the list ('singleclick', 'dblclick', 'contextmenu'). This is the triggering event of all layers added to the control without configured triggering event.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.defaultEvent

params.description: indicates the default format mime-type of the response of GetFeatureInfo requests.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.defaultInfoFormat

params.description: specifies the type of cursor to be displayed when pointing on vector feature of a layer previously added to the control. The value must be choosen in the possible values of the css cursor property.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.cursorStyle

params.description: Proxy URL to avoid cross-domain problems.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.proxyUrl

params.description: Proxy will not be used for this list of domain names. Only use if you know what you're doing.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.noProxyDomains

params.description: Specifies whether the map should auto-pan if the pop-up is rendered outside of the canvas. Defaults to true.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.autoPan

params.description: Used to customize the auto-pan animation. See {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/olx.html#.OverlayPanOptions olx.OverlayPanOptions}.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.autoPanAnimation

params.description: Margin (in pixels) between the pop-up and the border of the map when autopanning. Default is 20.
params.name: gfiOptions.options.autoPanMargin
